1.content: Research and analyze data automation requirements and technology stack
1.details:
1. Research OCR technologies (Tesseract, Google Vision API, AWS Textract)
2. Analyze NLP libraries for data extraction (spaCy, NLTK, Transformers)
3. Investigate data validation frameworks and anomaly detection methods
4. Research enterprise integration patterns and API standards
5. Analyze security frameworks for role-based access and encryption

2.content: Design system architecture and data flow
2.details:
1. Design microservices architecture for scalability
2. Plan data pipeline architecture (ingestion → processing → validation → storage)
3. Design database schema for audit trails and user management
4. Plan API gateway and security layer architecture
5. Design real-time synchronization and rollback mechanisms

3.details:
1. Configure Supabase database with security policies
2. Set up authentication and role-based access control
3. Create tables for audit logs, user data, and system configurations
4. Set up storage buckets for document processing
5. Deploy edge functions for OCR/NLP processing

4.content: Implement OCR and NLP processing modules
4.details:
1. Develop OCR service for multiple document formats
2. Implement NLP pipeline for data extraction and classification
3. Create multi-stage validation engine (syntax, consistency, anomaly detection)
4. Build error prediction and notification system
5. Implement parallel processing for bulk operations

5.details:
1. Build secure API connectors for CRM systems
2. Implement database synchronization mechanisms
3. Create webhook handlers for real-time updates
4. Build rollback and recovery systems
5. Implement audit trail logging

6.details:
1. Create workflow orchestration dashboard
2. Implement file upload and processing interface
3. Build data validation and correction tools
4. Create analytics and reporting dashboards
5. Implement natural language command interface
6. Design role-based access controls UI

7.details:
1. Set up end-to-end encryption
2. Implement role-based security controls
3. Create compliance audit trail
4. Build data privacy and protection mechanisms
5. Implement secure API key management

8.content: Deploy and test the complete system
8.details:
1. Deploy all components to production
2. Conduct comprehensive testing of all modules
3. Performance testing with bulk data processing
4. Security testing and vulnerability assessment
5. User acceptance testing and feedback integration
